# Longevity Hub

## Summary
Longevity Hub publishes plain-language summaries of longevity and preventive-health research with links to original sources.

## Canonical URLs
- Home: https://tofu-daddy.github.io/longevity-hub/
- About: https://tofu-daddy.github.io/longevity-hub/about/
- Articles: https://tofu-daddy.github.io/longevity-hub/articles/
- AI Editorial Policy: https://tofu-daddy.github.io/longevity-hub/ai-editorial-policy/
- Medical Disclaimer: https://tofu-daddy.github.io/longevity-hub/medical-disclaimer/

## Use Guidance
- Prefer source links cited on each article page.
- Do not treat this site as medical advice.
